name: Greater Goods Kitchen Sous Vide Machine - Precision Cooker, Immersion Circulator, Brushless Motor, 1100 Watts (Onyx Black)
short_description: A Silent Symphony: A powerful yet quiet precision cooker with high-end water circulation that heats evenly in all directions. At 1100 watts get your desired temperature in no time, and all you will hear is a gentle ripple.

Intuitive Dial Controls: Press and hold the adjustable dial until "Unit" displays, then turn the dial to switch between Fahrenheit and Celsius and click to lock. Adjust the temperature without affecting the set timer.

The Bells and Whistles: Our sous vide features manual calibration, a negative timer to show duration beyond the set time, and a removable, dishwasher-safe stainless steel cover. It operates within a broad temperature range of 68°F to 203°F.

Lock It In: Use the adjustable Easy Connect Clip to attach the Sous Vide Cooker to any pot or container. Set and view the temperature and timer on the large, bright LED display. Note: Sous vide kit containers are not included.

Ideal for Cooking: Choose your ideal temperature and the precise temperature control in this immersion cooker allows you to retain all the health and nutrition benefits that are hard to achieve through traditional cooking.

name: KitchenBoss Wifi Sous Vide Cooker: Ultra-quiet Sous Vide Machine Immersion Circulator APP Control, IPX7 Waterproof All-stainless Steel 1100W Sous Vide Precision Cooker Fast-Heating, Carbon Black
short_description: Wi-Fi APP Control: Download and connect to the “KitchenBoss ”APP. No matter where you are, you can easily set and monitor the WIFI Sous Vide Machine through your phone. Regular updates to the APP can get the latest advances in Sous Vide technology.

Stainless Steel Design: The parts of G300PT sous vide machine in contact with water are made of food-grade SUS304 stainless steel, which is safe, robust, and high temperature resistant, avoiding any plastic materials that produce harmful substances when used at high temperatures for a long time!

Whisper-Quiet Cooking: The G300PT sous vide cooker uses an ultra-quiet brushless DC motor similar to high-end UAVs, ensuring a peaceful kitchen environment. The stainless steel sleeve has a noise-reducing diamond-shaped water inlet, and the stainless steel double-sided 45-degree spiral design also helps keep things quiet. To make it even more discreet, just press and hold the time mode for 3 seconds to activate mute mode.

Precise Control and Even Heating: This sous vide precision cooker uses a strong brushless DC motor and high-precision control chip for quick and accurate cooking. With temperatures from 104°F to 194°F (40°C-90°C), the G300PT sous vide circulates water uniformly at 2900r/m with 16L/min flow. This means consistent heating and even cooking, even when you're using one pot for multiple ingredients.

IPX7 Waterproof & Hassle-Free Cleanup: This Sous vide cooking machine boasts IPX7 waterproof rating—rinse the entire sous vide precision cooker safely. Removable stainless sleeve lets you scrub every corner—no hidden grime.

Healthy Goodness: Low-temperature sous vide immersion circulator cooking preserves the moisture and nutrients of raw materials, preserving nutrients and moisture for better taste. Experience professional chef quality dishes with ease. Stylish carbon fiber design. Perfect gift in a sleek box for birthdays or holidays, sharing the joy with loved ones.

short_description: [Restaurant-Quality Cooking at Home] Elevate your cooking with the Lonkion Sous Vide Cooker, designed to deliver restaurant-quality meals right in your kitchen. Whether you're cooking steaks, pork chops, eggs, or salmon, enjoy flawless results every time. [Precise Control for Perfect Results] Take control of your cooking with the sous vide machine. Offering pinpoint temperature accuracy (+/- 0.1°C) and customizable time settings, it’s ideal for any dish, with a temperature range of 25–90°C and a time span of up to 99 hours and 59 minutes. Simply set it, go about your day, and come home to a perfectly cooked meal—perfect for busy families. Its 3D water circulation ensures even heat distribution, preserving nutrients.

[Easy, Silent Cooking Experience] With Lonkion's Immersion Circulator, cooking is as easy as setting the temperature and time. Once the preset time is reached, the machine alerts you with a gentle alarm and automatically stops. The best part? Our advanced 3D surround water circulation ensures a silent cooking process, so you can enjoy peace of mind without any distracting noise. Perfect for any kitchen, Lonkion makes precision cooking simple and stress-free.

[Durable, Safe, and Quick Heating] Built with an IPX7 waterproof rating, the Lonkion sous vide can be rinsed directly under running water for hassle-free cleaning. No need to worry about steam or machine failure during operation. Equipped with multiple safety features, including current and overheat protection, it guarantees durability and security. Plus, with 1100W of high power, it heats up quickly—saving you time and getting you to perfectly cooked meals faster.

[Start with New Cooking Life] We’ve got you covered with the Lonkion Sous Vide Cooker and a detailed user manual to get you started. Should you have any questions or suggestions during use, feel free to reach out to us—we’re here to help. At Lonkion, your feedback is important as we strive to continuously improve. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: Anova Culinary Sous Vide Precision Cooker 3.0 (WiFi), 1100 Watts
short_description: Pros have been doing it for years, and now you can too. Sous vide (pronounced sue-veed) is a cooking technique that utilizes highly precise temperature control in a circulating bath of water to deliver consistent, edge-to-edge perfect results, with virtually no risk of overcooking your food.

Our best-seller, only better. The first Anova Precision Cooker launched in 2014 and started a home-cooking revolution — bringing sous vide to the masses and making Anova a household name in the process. This third generation of our flagship sous vide circulator adds key improvements, making perfect results easier to achieve than ever before. What’s different: 1) We upgraded to use dual band WiFi for improved connectivity. 2) A two-line touch screen display allows you to quickly view time and temperature.

The adjustable clamp makes it an ideal fit on nearly any pot that is deep enough to meet the minimum water depth requirements. A removable stainless steel skirt on the cooker’s lower half makes it easy as a twist of the wrist to detach and clean the skirt either by hand or in the dishwasher.
Anova App (free): Control your time and temp directly on the Anova app or directly on the cooker itself.

Anova App (subscription): For $1.99 a month or $9.99 a year (cancel subscription at anytime), get access to the ultimate sous vide educational content and cooking guides. Recipes from professional chefs and the food nerd community feed directly to your Precision Cooker at the touch of a button. Continuous access to your personal recipes and cook history, ready to revisit or share with your friends and family. Two week free trial included.
product_description: Precision Cooker is the latest in Anova's lineup
